titleStmt.title: The atheist's tragedie: or The honest man's reuenge As in diuers places it hath often beene acted. Written by Cyril Tourneur.
titleStmt.author: Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Iohn Stepneth, and Richard Redmer, and are to be sold at their shops at the west end of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Variant: imprint has "for Iohn Stepney, and Richard Redmere".
A variant of the edition dated 1612.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: their shops at the west end of Paules
